Name: Honors Of War
Details: The Honors of War was a code of conduct whereby Mercinaries are expected to bide by the tradition of offering opponents the chance to surrender and pay a 'ransom' so they could return home. Eventually, all factions within the Inner Sphere and Periphery had adopted to one degree or another, this code. These 'Conventions'are based on the Ares Conventions and promoted fair dealing and limited warfare.
